attributes.action: Give everyone the chance to Opt Out of the NHS's new 'Everyone Counts' scheme which will share patient information
attributes.additional_details:
Confidentiality between a patient and their GP has always been taken for granted. However now GPs are being forced to hand over medical histories, including identificable information such as post codes and date of births.

We the public have been given no option in this.

I would like the government to given everyone the right to opt out of this scheme.
